description:
Gage and Spence was a really fun movie to make. They both remind me of a cute class clown I knew in high school.
They started by comparing biceps, armpits, legs, and feet. I just love watching Gage's muscular, hairy body in action.
My favorite part is at the end, when Gage dumps his load on Spence's ass (it looks like creamy white icing on a cinnamon roll) and then rubs it all in with his cock...
title: Gage & Spence
